price: 69. ¿Son ustedes quienes hacen que descienda de las nubes o Nosotros?
arabic: ءَأَنتُمۡ أَنزَلۡتُمُوهُ مِنَ ٱلۡمُزۡنِ أَمۡ نَحۡنُ ٱلۡمُنزِلُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: a-antum anzaltumūhu mina al-muz'ni am naḥnu al-munzilūna
